availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. King Robards. Father of Reuben Jarel Robards, George K. Robards, Virginia H. Robards, and William M Robards.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson, Division 2, p. 2-3. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994027-994058. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. Find A Grave, "William H. Robards (1826-1912)," Memorial #73032902, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=73032902 (accessed August, 29, 2017).
